description: Red silk with large yellow tie-dyed field at center with 5 red areas; printed floral designs at border and inside red areas, made up of small rectangles; sequins and gold, aqua and green embroidery around bottom and portions of right, left and top edges, at center and through yellow field
medium: Silk, metallic thread, sequins; tie-dyed, embroidery, printed fabric
title: Head covering
